name: Shifter (AIE Seattle)
description:
Explore the magical expanse of the Farwoods as The Last, a mysterious being who is trying to remember their identity. The truth is out there, but at what cost?

KeysControlsA/D (or arrow keys)MoveSpacebarJumpLeft-ClickMeleeRight-ClickSecondary AbilityETransform (when unlocked)EscapePauseR (if dead)Restart Level

The Last, King of Darkness and of the forests. Whose powers of shapeshifting rival none and are envied by all. Thieves in the night come to steal these spirits. The Last, rendered formless, must defeat these thieves to regain his essence  and become the King of Darkness once again.
